mapper.select: select f.*,rf.privilege from auth_func f left join auth_rolefunc rf on rf.funcid = f.funcid where rf.roleid in (select roleid from auth_operatorrole where operatorid = #{id}) order by f.sort;
select c.*,f.privilege from auth_role r right join auth_rolefunc f on f.roleid = r.roleid right join auth_func c on c.funcid = f.funcid where f.roleid = #{roleId};
mapper.delete: delete from auth_func where funcid=#{id} or parentid=#{id};
